message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $14,000. I believe this product will be highly valuable to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested but I'm hoping to get it for a bit less. I'm willing to pay $12,000. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I want to be fair. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
